info.short_description: Framapiaf is Framasoft's Mastodon instance. Framasoft is a popular and educational network promoting free software.
info.full_description:
Issu du monde Ã©ducatif et dÃ©sormais tournÃ©e vers l'Ã©ducation populaire, Framasoft est avant tout un rÃ©seau de projets, dont le premier, l'annuaire Framalibre, remonte Ã  2001.

Ces projets sont animÃ©s par des personnes collaborant autour d'une mÃªme volontÃ© : promouvoir les libertÃ©s numÃ©riques.

Le respect des libertÃ©s fondamentales des utilisatrices et utilisateurs, garanties par des contrats lÃ©gaux (les licences libres), est au cÅ“ur du mouvement libriste et permet de s'assurer que l'humain reste en maÃ®trise de l'outil numÃ©rique.

Le but de Framasoft est de proposer, principalement en ligne, un ensemble d'outils concrets et pratiques visant Ã  faciliter l'adoption :

    de logiciels libres (annuaire, clÃ©s USB, installateurâ€¦) ;

info.short_description:
mastodonten.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz offen fÃ¼r alle netten Leute. :-)
mastodonten.de is a Mastodon instance open to nice people
info.full_description:
Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfach gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollstÃ¤ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer LÃ¶schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts fÃ¼hren kÃ¶nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:


- BelÃ¤stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
- Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
- Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
- GewalttÃ¤tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder FÃ¶rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
- Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
- Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung
- Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder Ã¼bermÃ¤ÃŸige Werbung
- Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie stÃ¶rt. Das schlieÃŸt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social verfÃ¼gbar in deren Github-Repository.


Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

- Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

- Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

- Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

- Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

- Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

- Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

- Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

- Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests


Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.


(Based on the about of chaos.social)

info.short_description: Maly is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance running along other services like our PeerTube instance and a private cloud.
info.full_description:
Hello ! My name is Tijl Van den Brugghen, named KindlyFire online. I run this Mastodon instance and some other public services for anybody to enjoy. I detailed most information on this page, but feel free to ask me anything !

# Guarantees

* We do not track you. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
* Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
* We federate with every instance out there. But that does not say we allow every kind of content.

# Rules

Obviously, every instance has to have rules. Without this, although this instance is pretty small, there would be problems. Here they are:

* Respect everyone
* Do not spam (this applies mainly to bots)
* No NSFW without an appropriete Content-Warning.
* Any kind of illigal content is prohibited.
* Have fun ğŸ‰

More information is available on our about page: https://maly.io/about/more

info.short_description: An instance for open source developers, free culture community and dreamers.
info.full_description:
Nasqueron is a budding community of creative people, writers, developers and thinkers. We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

You'll find here like-minded people to connect to, hang out, and build projects.

We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. When we develop a project, our software is open source our datasources and content are licensed under CC-BY-SA or CC-BY license. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

We like experiments, originality and to discover new things.

We are Nasqueron.
Just the right place for you
